imdb.plot outline: "Three in the Key" is the high school boys basketball talk show that covers the state of Pennsylvania. Hosted by Richie Blyweiss and co-hosted by basketball analysts, Jack E. Kapp and Josh Abrams, they discuss what's going on in the PIAA and the rest of PA in terms of high school boys basketball. Three in the Key airs on Mondays at 7 pm on Facebook Live during the high school basketball season.
imdb.title: Three in the Key
plot: "_Three in the Key_ (qv)" is the high school boys basketball talk show that covers the state of Pennsylvania. Hosted by Richie Blyweiss and co-hosted by basketball analysts, Jack E. Kapp and Josh Abrams, they discuss what's going on in the PIAA and the rest of PA in terms of high school boys basketball. _Three in the Key_ (qv) airs on Mondays at 7 pm on Facebook Live during the high school basketball season.
